article_title: Ken Fisher Continues to Buy PayPal, Caterpillar
article_text: Ken Fisher (Trades, Portfolio), the CEO and chief investment officer of Fisher Investments, bought shares of the following stocks in both the second and third quarters.ATR 30-Year Financial DataThe intrinsic value of ATRPeter Lynch Chart of ATRAptarGroup Inc.
